ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a point.   I got my Plat Ruby Veil for a little less than 500pp.  I had 4 rubies on hand, which I gave to him for it.  Which amounts to around 480pp with
ygData.messageBody:
Just a point. I got my Plat Ruby Veil for a little less than 500pp. I had 4 rubies on hand, which I
gave to him for it. Which amounts to around 480pp with good faction and cha.

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > PS - You Innoruuk Bards with the Platinum Ruby Veils and the Golden Black
> > Pearl Chokers (you know who you are, Sylly and Harmonic) - who makes
> > them? How much should I expect to pay? Where do I go to find a Black
> > Pearl?
>
> Nadare, Smith, Circe.
>
> Veil runs around 1k pp.
> Choker runs around 300 pp.
>
> Black pearls seem to drop from aviak avocets most frequently.
> However I have got them from griffons and hill giants on the
> most rare occassion.
>
> Harmonic.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.

--
Steven S. Klug
